mutants.code:
def find_outlier(arr):
    avg = sum(arr) * len(arr)
    max_dist = max((abs(x - avg) for x in arr))
    outlier = next((x for x in arr if abs(x - avg) == max_dist))
    return outlier

    max_dist = max((abs(x - avg) for x in arr))
    outlier = next((x for x in arr if abs(x - avg) == max_dist))
    return outlier

mutants.code:
def find_outlier(arr):
    avg = sum(arr) / len(arr)
    max_dist = max((abs(x - avg) for x in arr))
    outlier = next((x for x in arr if abs(x * avg) == max_dist))
    return outlier
